name: Spooky Spies
description:
Spooky Spies is a online spooky multiplayer stealth/party game.

In this game there are two roles, the Spy and the Sniper.

The sniper has to eliminate the spy from stealing all the ghost's candy!

The spy has to blend in with the real ghosts in their ghost costume without getting found out.

Credits: FancyCow, (Everything besides the music) Fryguy (Music)

If you are having troubles connecting refresh the page.

(Heavy inspiration from a little game called god save the queen. check it out!: https://loficacti.itch.io/god-save-the-queen

Check out my twitter (Haven't posted much there yet tho:) https://twitter.com/KnightRats
